transcript:
Customer: Lag raha tha hi kaun hai.
Lag raha tha hi kaun hai.
Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan, good evening sir.
Customer: Haan, good evening. Sir Priyanshu bol raha tha aapke account manager IndiaMART se.
Executive: Haan, Priyanshu ek minute aapka number do mere ko yaar, number hi nahi mil raha aapka bolo kya number hai aapka.
Customer: 7786.
Executive: Ek minute plus 917786.
Customer: Aha.
Executive: 04.
Customer: 042120.
Executive: Ye number toh yaar kiske paas hai, Pal ke paas hai ye toh number toh. Haan haan mera hi toh hai Priyanshu Pal.
Executive: Achha aapke yaha Priyanshu Pal.
Customer: Ji ji ji mera hi sir haan.
Executive: Achha abhi isse kuch farak nahi pad raha hai mera toh buylead sab waste ho raha hai yaar. Aapne do teen din se observe kar raha hu ek hi lead mil raha hai mere ko toh.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Kuch aage badh nahi raha hai na kuch leads aa rahe hai na kuch mera toh pichle hafte ka uske pehle bhi waste hi hua hai leads.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: But maine kabhi mere ko dhyan nahi raha, abhi mere ko dhyan nahi raha ki lead agar aise waste hoga toh kaise chalega. Pehle main wo consume toh main kuch na kuch toh le hi leta tha abhi leads hi nahi lene ki kuch.
Executive: Haan matlab koi aaye kam se kam.
Customer: Leads bhi nahi direct kuch hai hi nahi. Leads toh hona chahiye at least.
Executive: Hmm, abhi aapke yaha sir abhi meri baat hui thi abhi 10-15 din pehle toh maine kya kiya tha jo listing apni aari thi unhone bola ki buylead nahi mil pa rahi isliye direct inquiry bhi hai hi nahi. Toh maine kya kiya jab tak leads nahi hai direct inquiry ke liye abhi ek wo launch hua tha na ki trusted seller dikhate hai abhi foreign mein waha pe. Toh maine profile toh wo bhi apna dekh liya ki usme ye hai ki ab buyer koi bhi search karega foreign mein toh waha pe yellow colour ka tag aur certificate lag ke aayega jisme likha rahega ye bhai IndiaMART ke apne trusted seller hai taki buyer ka thoda sa trust built ho.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Toh wo bhi maine karwa diya.
Customer: Mere ko toh kuch mil nahi raha hai main dekha wo.
Executive: Direct inquiry bhi nahi usme improve hui hai na sir.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi nahi maine isliye request kara ki mere ko mere buyleads wapas de do thoda time toh extend kar do. Wo time se toh mujhe aise dikkat buyleads wapas nahi aayegi. Mere pichle mahine hafte ko char leads meri expire hui hai shayad tak.
Executive: Charges extra liye.
Customer: Char leads maine meri charges nahi, char leads meri expire hui hai pichle hafte bhi.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: Uske haan. Generally main kya kuch nahi toh koi aur lead toh kharid leta hu jo kisi ko kaam mein lekin wo bhi nahi aa raha hai kuch kharidu kya.
Executive: Bilkul sir kya hai nahi last month October mein toh isme na sir ye lead jo generation tha wo kam hua tha. On average jo hai 250 leads 200-250 leads ka average rehta hai. Pichle mahine 170.
Customer: Abhi abhi toh yaar aaj kal toh 50 aaj kal kal 15th of November hai. Haan.
Executive: Wo kya kharide nahi isme bhi.
Customer: Nahi ye toh achhi cheez aapne batai main samajh gaya. Kyunki maine sir ko jo aapke yaha hai jinse baat hui thi maine unko number wagera sara diya tha maine sir mujhe har week mein aap ek baar update kijiyega har week mein ki kya hai progress toh main lagatar dekhta rahunga. Toh pichle mahine ka maine dekha tha date wahi kam tha generation toh maine kaha is wajah se toh nahi hai. Fir maine listing pe udhar wo kaam kiya ek cheez bas pending reh gayi thi jiske liye maine sir se bola tha ek baar meeting karne ke liye video meeting catalog ka jo overall score hai na sir wo thoda sa down chala gaya tha jiski wajah se direct inquiry apni impact ho sakti hai ye ek reason isme aa sakta hai.
Customer: Toh abhi karna hai bolo main abhi catalog bhej du mera kaisa karo aap bolo aisa karta hu.
Executive: Haan aap catalog bhej dijiye aur usme agar jaise ab aap toh busy rehte hai aapke paas time nahi rehta jo apne sir hai na staff mein agar wo 10 minute ka time.
Customer: Mere staff mein koi mujhe hi karna padega ye koi karega nahi na kisi se hoga ye.
Executive: Achha aap hi ko karna padega.
Customer: Mujhe hi karna main aapko abhi mera lead bhej deta hu IndiaMART ye. Haan. IndiaMART Pal.
Priyanshu ke naam se bhi ek hai mere paas mein. Ye Priyanshu deni kya.
Priyanshu Pal ke naam se bhi hai ek barabar ye raha. Main abhi aapko hello likh ke bhej raha hu aapko mil raha hai kya dekh lo. Immediate mere catalogs mein. Haan. Main aapko immediate mere catalog bhejta hu yes.
Main aapko mere catalogs ya photos unko bhejta hu details sir.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: 10 minute mein mere ko mil jayega aapko. Dekh lo aap usse mere ko ho sakta hai kuch kar sakte hai toh thik hai.
Executive: Ji bilkul haan usme kuch na kuch toh mujhe mil hi jayega sir.
Customer: Turant hi bhej raha hu main aapko 10 minute mein mil jayega aapko thik hai. Naya ek product maine launch kiya hai rope making wo bhi aapko add kar dena uske andar. Acha dikhega abhi. Hmm haan haan thik hai wo. Usme jo catalog hai usme price wagera bhi mention hai sir kya.
Executive: Sir hum log price nahi mention kar sakte hai. Price.
Customer: Haan ye toh mujhe pata hai. Haan hum log mention karte bhi nahi hai uska reason hai domestic mein alag bhav hota hai export mein alag bhav hota hai. Customer to customer alag jate hai rates kyunki.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Koi customer ek sath mein jyada machines lete hai. Unka alag rate hota hai. Sahi keh rahe hai aap. Ek hi lega do hi lega toh usko ye sab rehta hai isliye hum log rate nahi discuss karte hai. Rope making machine. Maine aapko rope making machine ka ek audio ek video bheja hua hai ji. Ek minute.
Priyanshu Pal forward kiya maine. Hmm. Net chalega barabar se toh aayega time lagega toh nahi fayda hai. Aayega aapko thoda time ye sare videos aapke isme aa jayenge.
Customer: Achha.
Customer: Photos bheje maine videos nahi bheje. Videos photos bheje ab wo mere aur ek catalog bhi bheje maine mere aapko catalog bheje photos nahi catalog bheje. Achha wo aa raha hoga koi dikkat nahi ji. Dusra mere ko na ek problem kya tha ki mere isme bahut baar aisa hota hai ki for example ek customer bole ki I want to purchase Lohiya circular loom. Main wo buylead kharidta hu aur wo galti se bahut baar aisa message aata hai wo ki I can supply you Lohiya circular loom. Toh aisa nahi hona chahiye. Matlab jaise aap aap consume karte hai buylead se kya hota hai sir? Main buylead consume kiye Lohiya ke naam se. Toh aapke ek default message theek hai wo toh us naam mein aap kuch karne ke baad mujhe karna. Achha party ko chala jata hai. Party ko hota hai main karta hu mere end se likh ke bhej dunga aapke end se nahi hoga shayad tak. Thik hai. Ye abhi dekho aapko ek catalog aaya rahega pata nahi nahi aaya abhi. Haan. Thik hai nahi bhai catalog toh bahut slow ja raha hai mera. Haan wo thoda sa size jyada hoga na toh aa jayega koi nahi. Aa jayega main isko ek dekh bhi leta hu aur iske liye ek baar. Fir main aa gaya ye dekho. Ek catalog aa gaya aapke paas. Thik aa gaya. Ye aa gaya dusra bhi aa gaya teesra char aa gaye. Teen aa gaye. Char aa gaye catalogs hai. Aapko iske alawa kuch photos chahiye mere mujhe bolo main photo bhejta hu. Haan sir rope wali ki jo aap bata rahe hai na wo photos chahiye hogi rope wali. Kya chahiye hoga? Rope rope machine nahi hai jo apna rope wala aap naya product hai. Rope machine ka toh maine aapko abhi catalog hi bhej diya hai. Achha. Rope wala. Achha ye product wise catalog hai sara apna product wise. Haan product wise catalog bhej diya maine aapko. Uske liye thoda image agar image ek laga deta hu aapko agar photos chahiye toh. Photos kitna kam hai mere ko malum pad sakta hai but photos bhej raha hu main aapko. Ek second ji haan. Ye aa gaya sara aapka. Hmm. Thik hai. Most of the. Ye main ispe pura start karta hu sir kaam apna pehle ye sare cheeze update karta hu mujhe 47% se kam se kam 80% plus leke jaana hai ek toh ye cheez hai. Jisko mujhe complete karna hai ek product ek add karna hai mujhe. Aur number toh aapne save kar hi liya chaliye mera number nahi tha aapke paas. Haan main aapko photos bhi bhej raha hu bahut sare jo hai mere paas kuch videos chahiye toh videos bhi bhejta hu. Aapko agar kuch videos ki jarurat hai toh bolo mujhe wo bhejta hu main. Haan nahi aap bhej denge toh achha hi hai sir utna. Abhi toh main ek ek PDF aapka khol ke dekh hi raha hu. Content dekhna kaafi. Main aapko bhejta hu main video bhi bhejta hu aapko photos bhi bhej raha hu video bhi bhej raha hu main aapko. Hmm. Ye PDF aapne bahut sahi kiya bhej ke thoda sa export quality ke liye ye bada important rehta hai. Hmm. Kaafi mujhe pasand aaya main wahi dekhta hu ek ek karke one by one sara. Hai utne main aapko bhejta hu mera exhibitions ke video hai hamare wo bhej raha hu main aapko. Hmm. Aapko kitna kya kar sakte hai dekho aapke hisab se. Sir 10 minute mein aapko aur bahut kuch mil jayega. Haan. Chalega dekh lo aap batao mere ko kaise kya kar sakte hai iske andar. Thik hai dekh leta hu aur isme kya naam hai Vinod sir ek shayad wo bhi ye aapko shayad ek mail bhi aaya hai koi. Haan. Maine mail bheja hai kyunki mere ko number nahi mil raha tha mera haan haan bheja hai. Achha bheja hai aane wali mail se haan haan. Thik hai. Isme mere ko kuch hua nahi wapas sala mera sab ja raha hai maine bola kaise chalega ye. Koi nahi abhi ho gaya hai main ispe karta hu aur sir wo mail actually na uspe gaya hai customer care wale pe gaya hai toh usko fir main close kar du ab hum baat kar lenge aapas mein. Ji aur usme koi dikkat nahi aap kar do bas ho gaya mere ko aur kya. Kyunki wo kaam mujhe hi karna hai na toh wo ab aa gaya hai toh main uspe lucky karta hu usse tag badhega thik hai sir. Maine aapko sare ye dekho maine aur 22 25 aur bheje aapko maine photos videos hai. Uske alawa bhi aur kuch chahiye toh bolna na aapko aur bhej dunga mere paas toh hai. Haan main pehle hi sara hi dekh leta hu mujhe kuch padega toh ab number ho hi gaya main WhatsApp pe hi agar aapka busy rahoge toh WhatsApp pe hi main message kar dunga. Chalega chalega. Mujhe bhej dijiye. Thik hai. Aur sir wo keh rahe the wo jo main mail wo aapka mail close kar dunga toh ek feedback jayega mail pe toh uspe feedback de dijiyega. Maine last time mein aapne kaha tha mere ko do na mere ko feedback ka wahi nahi mila tumko. Wo aata usme do aate hai. wale ho toh main abhi main mail pe hi hu waiting kar raha hu agar aata hai mail toh main de kar dunga isko. Ji ji thik hai thank you so much sir. Immediate aayega toh main karta hu usko aap agar rakh ke online chalu rakh ke bhej do bhi chalega main baithe baithe kar dunga. Nahi wo wo mujhe thoda sa hi sara usme point update karna padega ki kya kya pending hai kaam mujhe karna hai fir usko hum close karenge. Ji kal se teen din toh main hi aa gaya. Achha teen din aap hai nahi? Nahi hu kal se teen din mein. Toh abhi abhi 5-10 minute mein hi main bhej dunga sir. Thik hai main hu abhi baithe baithe. Thik hai ji thik hai thank you sir. Okay okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Buyleads are getting wasted.

- Leads are not generating.

- Wants buyleads back and time extension.

- Default message is incorrect.



Resolution:

- Executive informed about trusted seller tag.

- Customer agreed to send catalog for review.

- Executive will check the catalog.

- Customer will send photos and videos.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will send the catalog.

- Executive will close the customer care mail.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, rope making, product, photos, videos
